text:
🌟 Exciting News! 🎉
I am thrilled to share that I have joined the Editorial Board of the IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters (RA-L) as an Associate Editor! 🤖👀 

Thank you to everyone who has supported me on this journey!

https://t.co/diqeD7eqvV

#IEEE #Robotics #Automation… https://t.co/vgcg4NtQBT

@abursuc Very nice! 
I'd also love to see what books are on the bookshelf in the back😬

"Revolutionizing Autonomous Vehicle Development with Foundation Models." 
Boris Ivanovic from @nvidia
Tomorrow (Oct 22) at 15:00 GMT, 
zoom info: ai-info@ku.edu.tr or DM! #kuisaitalks #ArtificialIntelligence https://t.co/kIQ88viPSK
